import "./navbar.css"; import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import MenuImg from "./images/menu.png"; import { UserContext } from "./UserContext"; const NavBar = () => { const { user, cartItems } = useContext(UserContext); return ( <>
ecoTaran
Acasa
Anunturi
{user ? (
{user.name}
) : ( <>
Cart {cartItems.length > 0 && ({cartItems.length})}
Log In
)}
); }; export default NavBar;
